Text: Has a worm do not download

Avira AntiVir found a trojan virus inside the Eidos.exe file. AntiVir noticed the trojan the second I mounted the .iso into Daemon Tools.

There is  a virus in this one. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.
The original has no Eidos.exe that autoruns. Just check Autorun.inf. It uses Eidos.exe. Then why is there an unused Autorun.exe on the disc? The disc is modified to autostart a virus.
